Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board

Class CardMarket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board.CardMarket
public class CardMarket
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the CardMarket used to buy DevCards.

    Default constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardMarket

      public CardMarket​(java.util.ArrayList<DevCard> devCardDeck)
      Default constructor.
      Parameters:
      devCardDeck - contains all the development cards.

  • Method Details

    • pickCard

      public DevCard pickCard​(Color color, int level)
      Takes the available card of the required color and level and removes it from the card market.
      Parameters:
      color - color requested by the player
      level - level requested by the player
      Returns:
      the required card if it's available, otherwise returns null

    • returnDevCard

      public void returnDevCard​(DevCard card)
      Adds the card to the market.
      Parameters:
      card - card that needs to be added.

    • availableCards

      public java.util.ArrayList<DevCard> availableCards()
      Returns all the visible cards from the card market.
      Returns:
      a list of DevCard.

    • remainingCards

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> remainingCards()
      Returns the number of cards in each CardMarket stack.
      Returns:
      a list of integers representing the number of cards in each stack.

    • discardDevCard

      public void discardDevCard​(Color color)
      Will be called when a discard action token is drawn. This method discards cards from the CardMarket.
      Parameters:
      color - color required by the action token.

    • remainingCardsOfColor

      public int remainingCardsOfColor​(Color color)
      Counts the cards that are left of a specific color.
      Parameters:
      color - color required.
      Returns:
      returns the number of the cards of the given color.

    • noCardsOfAColor

      public boolean noCardsOfAColor()
      Checks, for all colors, if there are still cards available.
      Returns:
      returns true if there are some, otherwise returns false.

    • getDevCardGrid

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DevCard>>> getDevCardGrid()
